meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a saint.
meanings.sent1: Her kind and gentle nature made her seem saintlike to everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The old man's saintlike behavior towards others earned him the respect of the entire village.
meanings.sent3: Seeing the little girl help the injured bird, the neighbors jokingly called her saintlike for the day.
meanings.sent4: The way he forgave his enemies was truly saintlike, like something out of a storybook.
meanings.sent5: The saintlike aura that surrounded her made people feel at peace in her presence.

meanings.definition: Exhibiting qualities associated with a saint.
meanings.sent1: The volunteer's selfless actions were saintlike, always putting others before himself.
meanings.sent2: The nun's saintlike dedication to her work inspired those around her to do better.
meanings.sent3: Even in the chaos of the city, his saintlike patience never seemed to waver.
meanings.sent4: Her saintlike compassion towards animals was evident in the way she cared for every stray she found.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's saintlike bravery in the face of danger was admired by all who knew him.

meanings.definition: Having the virtues or qualities of a saint.
meanings.sent1: The priest's saintlike wisdom guided many through their darkest times.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's saintlike patience with her students was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent3: Despite his mischievous nature, he had a saintlike ability to always do the right thing.
meanings.sent4: Her saintlike forgiveness towards those who wronged her was a lesson in grace.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's saintlike dedication to saving lives was unwavering, even in the face of adversity.
